code: import React from 'react'; import { Composition, registerRoot } from 'remotion'; import { AbsoluteFill } from 'remotion'; const MyComp = () => <AbsoluteFill style={{backgroundColor: 'green', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', fontSize: '4rem', color: 'white'}}>S3 Upload Test!</AbsoluteFill>; export const RemotionRoot = () => <Composition id="MyComp" component={MyComp} durationInFrames={90} fps={30} width={1920} height={1080} />; registerRoot(RemotionRoot);
